content: I agree, celebrities and public figures have the ability to use their platform to bring attention to social issues, raise awareness and encourage positive change. The Oscars is one such event where actors, filmmakers, and other industry professionals from around the world can come together to showcase their work and highlight important issues that they care about. Through their acceptance speeches and other public statements, celebrities can use their influence to bring attention to causes that they are passionate about and encourage their fans and followers to get involved in making a difference.
